          <title>
            <string language="en">Daytime and night time</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tageszeit und Nachtzeit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Journée et temps de nuit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dia e tempo da noite</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Giorno e tempo di notte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ημέρα και χρόνος νύχτας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Día y tiempo de la noche</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that when daytime in UK, its night time in India and Australia.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Australia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die wenn Tageszeit in 
Großbritannien, seine Nachtzeit in Indien und Australien.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre cela quand journée dans
au R-U, son temps de nuit en Inde et l'Australie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostrar aquela quando dia no 
Reino Unido, seu tempo da noite em India e Austrália.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra quella quando il 
giorno nel Regno Unito, il relativo tempo di notte in India e 
l'Australia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι όταν πρωινός στο 
UK, ο χρόνος νύχτας του στην Ινδία και την Αυστραλία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra eso cuando día en Reino
Unido, su tiempo de la noche en la India y Australia.</string>
          </description>
